value:
$WmMPID_ニョルズ,ch00_51_Njord_M_Normal,Face|Welcome, children of Midgard.$k$pI am Njörðr, king of Vanaheimr
and god of the sea.$k$pWhat is it you desire?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Normal2|Thank you for granting us audience,
King Njörðr. We have come to you in
light of a revelation from Lady Seiðr.$k$pThe seer Gullveig is upon us, and our
realm is in danger of ruin at her hand.
If that vision of the future is true...$k$p$EFace_Anger|I must ask for your aid in defeating
the seer so that we might save our
realm and kingdom.$k$pWe had hoped that you, King Njörðr,
might know of some way to stop her.$k$p$WmMPID_ニョルズ,ch00_51_Njord_M_Normal,Face_Normal2|...Of course. As a king of gods, there
is nothing beyond my knowledge.$k$p$EFace_Cool2|All things are within my grasp, from
the wide reach of Vanaheimr to the
smallest wave upon the sea...$k$pAt this moment, the servants of the
seer run rampant across Vanaheimr
itself—and they must be dealt with.$k$p$EFace_Anger|Hm... And not only that...$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Anger|What is it, King Njörðr?$k$p$WmMPID_ニョルズ,ch00_51_Njord_M_Normal,Face_Anger|The goddess Heiðr is under attack
by those who serve the seer.$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Heiðr? No, Sister! I must go to her!$k$p$WmMPID_ニョルズ,ch00_51_Njord_M_Normal,Face_Anger|You will find her on the banks of the
Spun-Gold River... Go now. You must
hurry, Seiðr.$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Yes. I will leave now!$k$pHold on, Heið... I will save you.$k$p

$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Children of Midgard, I must go to
Heiðr's aid. While I do this, you all
should stay—$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Lady Seiðr! If she's your sister,
we can't in good conscience just
stand by while you go to her!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|That's right. You came to us to
help save our world. We will
gladly help you in turn.$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face|Thank you, children of Midgard.
You are...much kinder than I had
ever expected.$k$p$Sbs1000|
